local_intent: Perform a single planar push on the cloth edge (0.1 m at 180°) after confirming cloth visibility and the end-effector yaw at 90°.
assumptions: Tool is already in contact with the cloth from prior LowerUntilContact step
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT push stroke parameters (distance=0.1, direction_deg=180, timeout_ms=1200) executed after alignment/yaw=90 and contact establishment.
